column1: herbert cecil samples| herbert cecil samples
column6: 2015 at u. t. medical center. cecil was a loving husband
column7: father and grandfather. he married his high school sweetheart and they just celebrated their 63rd wedding anniversary in may. he was a charter member of memorial baptist church where he served as trustee
column8: was a former member of the county legislative body (clb) and a successful newport businessman. he was a veteran having served in the united states navy for four years during the korean war aboard the aircraft carrier
column9: uss midway. he was preceded in death by his parents
column10: robert samples and margaret samples bitt; and brother
column11: james o. samples. he is survived by his loving wife june holt samples; children
column12: debbie (roger) franklin of newport; dr. don (tammy) samples of johnson city; diana didi samples (casey kelly) of newport; sisters
column13: barbara (ralph) smith of newport; maude hosey of barnesville
column21: dr. tara shields (landon) and taylor samples; many nieces
column23: cousins and his church family. the family will receive friends from 6:00 pm until 8:00 pm monday
column25: 2015 at manes funeral home. funeral services will be held 11:00 am tuesday
column27: 2015 at memorial baptist church with pastor harold ball
column28: chaplain glen bradley and rev. alvin watts officiating. entombment will follow in resthaven memorial mausoleum
column29: with military honors. in lieu of flowers the family requests that donations be made to the memorial baptist church building fund
column32: tn 37822. family and friends may sign the guest register on line at: www. manesfuneralhome. com. manes funeral home in charge.
